root.name: Mystic Midway: Phantom Express
root.description: Mystic Midway: Phantom Express is a shooting game for the Philips CD-i system. The game's premise is that you are on a roller coaster that takes you through your entire life. To beat each level you need to get a certain score, you achieve these scores by shooting at random objects that represent the levels theme. Other than the random objects being thrown around the scenery is noticeably pitch black. In between the levels a live action cutscene of a carnival barker belittling you will play.
